name: Washman 3D Soft Morphism Style
description: AI prompt templates for generating Washman UI design style

masterPrompt.en: Design a premium mobile app UI screen with modern 3D soft morphism style. Soft, elevated 3D elements with subtle depth. Gradient buttons (teal #1F8783 to dark teal #12504E). Light cream/off-white background (#FCFCFC). Smooth rounded corners (pill-shaped buttons, 12-16px cards). Soft drop shadows with slight blur. Clean minimalist layout with generous white space. Glassmorphism touches on cards. Floating UI elements with layered depth effect. Premium luxury feel, similar to high-end fintech apps. iOS-style design language with soft UI elements. Neumorphic input fields with inset subtle shadows. Gradient text for accent elements.
masterPrompt.ar: تصميم واجهة تطبيق موبايل فاخر بأسلوب 3D Soft Morphism الحديث. عناصر ثلاثية الأبعاد ناعمة مع عمق خفيف. أزرار متدرجة (أزرق مخضر #1F8783 إلى أزرق مخضر داكن #12504E). خلفية كريمية فاتحة (#FCFCFC). زوايا دائرية ناعمة. ظلال خفيفة وناعمة. تصميم نظيف وبسيط.

input.text: Neumorphic text input, light gray background (#F9FAFB), 12px rounded corners, 2px border (#E5E7EB), subtle inset effect, placeholder text gray (#9CA3AF), teal border on focus (#1F8783)

card.default: Floating card, white background, 16px rounded corners, soft shadow (4px blur), subtle depth, clean minimal content
card.preview: Preview card, teal tinted background (10% opacity), 16px rounded corners, icon on left, content right, no shadow
card.glass: Glassmorphism card, semi-transparent white, blur backdrop, thin border, floating effect

bottomSheet.default: iOS-style bottom sheet, 24px top rounded corners, white background, centered drag handle (40px wide, gray #D1D5DB), semi-transparent backdrop overlay

badge.gradient: Pill badge, teal gradient background, white text, 6px vertical padding, 13px horizontal padding, 32px border radius
badge.chip: Selectable chip, gray background (#F3F4F6) default, teal background when selected, 10px vertical padding, 20px border radius

progressDots.default: Horizontal progress indicator, pill-shaped active dot (24x6px), circular inactive dots (6x6px), teal color (#1F8783), 8px gap between dots

animationStyle.entry: Fade in with slight upward slide (FadeInDown)
